P3Menu - Class in p3.Configuration
 
P3Menu() - Constructor for class p3.Configuration.P3Menu
 
pcProposition() - Method in class p3.Game.Mastermind
This method will select randomly a code in the possibilities list Note; if there is no code list instanciate and filled this method will close the app Raised a FATAL exception
play() - Method in class p3.Configuration.P3Menu
 
playMenuChoice(String) - Method in class p3.Configuration.P3Menu
This method allow loop on main, play game in function o choice This method allow to Quit Centralized play, back to main and quit method
possibilitySelection(String) - Method in class p3.Game.Mastermind
This method will suppress all code which the clues compare to the Pc proposal are not the same than the comparison between secret code and Pc proposal Note this method will also suppress the Pc Proposal.
